item.title: Bayes stuff
item.description: Introduction What is all about? What shoud you know? Basically how all this stuff works and for what do we need this? Bayesian formulae Simple school formalue Bayesian approach сдвигание prior вместо вычисления Bayesian inference fucking prior, posterior, likelihood who and why did intoduce all this words Bayesian NN параметры распределений вместо слоев Applications Sparsification Links lots of them of for each section?
